pages.text: The Blitz is a mob that spawns in warm, dry biomes. It has 10 hearts and deals 1.5 hearts of damage at close range. It shoots projectiles which deal 3.5 hearts of damage and apply the Shocked effect. It has a chance to drop Blitz Motes, which can be crafted or pulverized into Blitz Powder.
pages.title: Blitz

pages.text: Shocked: Decreases attack speed by 15% per level.
